nav.aiAdvisor: Mai Ba da Shawara na AI

auth.loginDescription: Shigar da bayanan ku don shiga dashboard din kasuwancin ku
auth.registerDescription: Fara sarrafa kuɗin kasuwancin ku a cikin mintuna kaɗan
auth.name: Cikakken Suna
auth.passwordRequirements: Kalmar sirri dole ta kasance akalla haruffa 8, ciki har da manyan haruffa, ƙananan haruffa, lamba, da alamar musamman
auth.passwordsDontMatch: Kalmomin sirri ba su dace ba
auth.resetInstructions: Shigar da adireshin imel ɗinku kuma za mu aiko muku da hanyar sake saitawa
auth.resetLinkSent: Idan wannan imel yana wanzu, an aika hanyar sake saita kalmar sirri.

dashboard.title: Nazarin Kasuwanci
dashboard.subtitle: Tallace-tallace na Wata-wata, Kashe Kuɗi, da Trends na Riba

chart.noData: Babu bayani. Fara yin rikodin tallace-tallace da kashe kuɗi don ganin trends.

reminders.recordSales: Ku tuna ku rubuta tallace-tallace na yau! Ku kiyaye bayanan ku.
reminders.highExpenses: Kashe kuɗi ya fi yawa a wannan makon. Duba yadda kuke kashe kuɗi.
reminders.lowStock: Samfur {{count}} yana ƙarewa. Yi la'akari da sake cika.
reminders.lowStock_other: Samfura {{count}} suna ƙarewa. Yi la'akari da sake cika.
reminders.allHealthy: Dukkan matakan kayan kasuwanci suna da lafiya

quotes.quote1: Nasara ba ƙarshe ba ce, gazawa ba mutuwa ba ce: ƙarfin hali ne ya kamata ku ci gaba. - Winston Churchill
quotes.quote2: Hanyar farawa ita ce ku daina magana ku fara aiki. - Walt Disney
quotes.quote3: Kada ku kalli agogo; yi abin da yake yi. Ku ci gaba. - Sam Levenson
quotes.quote4: Makomar gobe ta dogara da abin da kuke yi yau. - Mahatma Gandhi
quotes.quote5: Nasara yawanci takan zo ga waɗanda suke shagaltuwa da aiki. - Henry David Thoreau
quotes.quote6: Damammaki ba su faru ne kawai. Ku ƙirƙira su. - Chris Grosser
quotes.quote7: Iyaka ga abin da zamu samu gobe shine shakkokinmu na yau. - Franklin D. Roosevelt

sales.title: Sarrafa Tallace-tallace
sales.noSales: Ba a yi rikodin tallace-tallace ba tukuna
sales.saleRecorded: An yi rikodin tallace-tallace cikin nasara!

subscription.title: Biyan Kuɗi da Lissafin Kuɗi
subscription.trialMessage: Kuna da kwanaki {{days}} saura a cikin gwajin kyauta
subscription.expiredMessage: Gwajin ku ya ƙare. Yi biyan kuɗi don ci gaba da amfani da KudiManager.

setupWizard.title: Barka da zuwa KudiManager
setupWizard.subtitle: Bari mu saita kasuwancin ku a cikin matakai 2 kawai
setupWizard.step1Subtitle: Saita kasuwancin ku a cikin 'yan mintuna
setupWizard.step2Subtitle: Za ku iya ƙara ƙarin samfura daga shafin Kayan Kasuwanci
setupWizard.setupComplete: Saitawa ta kammala! Barka da zuwa KudiManager.
